titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Badge Collection BADGES.001
titlestmt.author: Bonnie Gordon

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-11-30 13:11:03 -0500.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.unittitle: Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Badge Collection

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is an unprocessed, assembled collection of the badges of various individuals and organizations.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Because of the assembled nature of this collection, copyright status varies across the collection. Copyright is assumed to be held by the original creator of individual items in the collection; these items are expected to pass into the public domain 120 years after their creation. Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: The provenance of the materials is varied. Items were obtained through purchases, donations, standing orders with publishers, arrangements with labor unions and other organizations, exchanges with other libraries, and through ongoing collecting by Tamiment staff.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials in this collection have been compiled by the Tamiment Library. The accession numbers associated with this collection are 1950.174, NPA.2000.060, and NPA.2006.004.
